name: High Heavens
description:
MAKE SURE TO CHECK THE 'SYNC MONITOR FPS' OPTION FROM THE OPTIONS MENU!

You are an angel sent from the High Heavens to defeat the rapabons and end their terror upon the world!

Controls: LMB/Arrow keys to move, LMB/Enter to interact.

This was my first game ever made, and was done in the RPG Maker MV engine. Make sure to look around and interact with all kinds of objects... There are hidden treasures (or rooms) to be found!
